author: James Van Straten
title: Bitcoin, Bonds, and the Rising Influence of Japan’s Yield Curve
description: Bitcoin's surprising alignment with long-end Japanese government bonds signals a deeper global macro shift.
content:
Weston Nakamura founder of Across The Spread, a global markets analyst known for his macro insights through an Asia lens, highlights a surprising and increasingly critical macro relationship.
